title: Can't Log In
body:
I can't log in anymore. Anyone else having issues ?
Client is stucked at **Authenticating....**

Oh and if anyone wants to coach me or give me crucial tips, add me.

replies.body: Heya, not seeing any issues for EUW at the moment but I'll keep an eye out.  In the meantime, try the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in case your network settings have changed.  It could be blocking you from reaching the authentication service, and firewall or antivirus settings can be the culprit too!

Also cannot login, I downloaded the hextech repair tool and used it, and went through most of the connection steps.. though there were a couple that seemed a bit more complicated that I did not attempt, like the security settings but... still cant login.. also, I cant get support through the LOL website because it says I must be logged in to submit a ticket for technical issues, then when it takes me to the login page, I login and it shows an error that states that there is a problem, but then I redirect and find that I am actually logged into the website, so I am at an impasse now

Any help would be greatly appreciated
Hey there, what ISP are you using?

This problem was alike 15 minutes. Now I can login. Using Vodafone Germany.

But the client is some kind of slow.
What ISP are you using?  I'm not seeing any issues, so I'm curious if it may be ISP related.
